title: The Ember's Final Breath
description: The 'Great-Ember'—the source of the city's warmth—is dying. You must enter the 'Core-Vault' for a final stand.

turns.narrative: The Core-Vault is a place of white heat and blinding light. The 'Great-Ember' is a sphere of liquid fire the size of a house, vibrating with a tone that signifies its impending collapse. The air is so hot it scorches your lungs.
turns.choice_a: Identify the cause of the decay (Int DC 13)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You find 'Void-Rust' on the primary heat-cables. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Channel your own mana into the Ember (Risk DC 15)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You stabilize the core for a few seconds. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: A 'Scourge-Titan'—a titan made of solidified shadow and rusted iron—steps into the vault.

turns.narrative: The Titan is the source of the decay. It's 'Eating' the heat to empower its own shadow-form. It roars, a sound that vibrates the very bedrock of the city.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You create a breach in its defense. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Use the 'Star-Prism' to burn through the shadow
turns.consequence_b: Success: The light carves a path through the beast's chest. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Titan lunges, its shadow-claws reaching for the Ember itself.

turns.narrative: You must stand between the Titan and the Ember. The heat is reaching a 'White-Line' critical point. The vault walls are starting to melt into slag.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You take the Titan's full force, protecting the city's heart. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You push the Shadow back, but lose some of your own life-essence. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: The Titan collapses, its shadow-form burning away in the intense heat of the Ember.

turns.narrative: The Titan is dead, but the Ember is still unstable. The Priestess's voice crackles over the comms: 'It's going to blow! Use the First-Shard!'
turns.choice_a: Apply the First-Shard to the Core (Dex DC 15)
turns.consequence_a: Success: The Ember stabilizes, its color returning to a steady, warm orange. (+50 Morale)
turns.choice_b: Evacuate the Vault and let it blow (Evil Action)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You escape, but the city is plunged into eternal frost. (-50 Reputation)
turns.convergence: The vault is quiet. The 'Great-Ember' is breathing steadily once more.

turns.narrative: You've saved the city, but you're badly burned. You see a 'Vision' of the Weaver standing in the fire, smiling. She hands you a 'Sun-Amulet'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You gain permanent resistance to Void-damage. (+1 Rare Gear)
turns.choice_b: Refuse and ask for the city's safety
turns.consequence_b: Success: She grants the settlement a 'Golden-Age' (Bonus resources for a month). (+100 Reputation)
turns.convergence: You emerge from the vault as a legend. The city is warm. The sun is gold.

turns.narrative: The High-Ward holds a celebration in your honor. A statue is commissioned in the central plaza.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You are now a 'High-Councilor'. (+10 Reputation)
turns.consequence_b: Success: Your legend becomes part of the city's spirit. (+1 Fame)
turns.convergence: You find a 'Vial of Ember-Sap' in your pocket—a gift from the fire.

turns.narrative: The Ember-Sap can be used to forge the 'Ultimate-Weapon'.
turns.consequence_b: Success: You ensure the settlement's survival for decades. (+100 Resources)
turns.convergence: The night is clear, and for the first time, you don't feel the cold.

turns.narrative: A 'Scourge-Lord' sends you a message: 'The Ember is just one spark. The dark is infinite.'
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find a weakness in the Lord's own shadow. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: The 'Ember's Final Breath' was actually its first true breath in centuries.

turns.narrative: You sit on the battlements, looking out at the Scourge-Fog. It seems a little thinner today.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You are wealthy beyond measure. (+2000 Gold)
turns.choice_b: Donate the gold to the Bio-Ward
turns.consequence_b: Success: You are a saint of the wastes. (+20 Reputation)
turns.convergence: The sun rises over a city that finally knows peace.

turns.narrative: You close your eyes and feel the warmth. It's the warmth of home. The warmth of a future you fought for.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You have earned it. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The siege of the Southern Gate is over. The settlement has survived its darkest hour, and the name of the 'Ember' will be sung for generations.

risk_matrix.penalty: Settlement destroyed. The campaign ends in darkness.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences.

permanent_effects.settlement: Settlement survives; Golden-Age unlocked if Weaver gift chosen
